Wishlist.title: Hyperfocus: How to Work Less to Achieve More
Wishlist.author: Chris Bailey

Currently reading.title: Origins: How the Earth Shaped Human History
Currently reading.author: Lewis Dartnell

Reading List 2024.title: The Seven Deaths of Evelyn Hardcastle
Reading List 2024.author: Stuart Turton
Reading List 2024.description: Really loved the idea of letting the main character relive the same day mutiple times but as different characters to solve a murder. But at some point it was a bit too repetetive and made it a bit harder to keep reading. Can see this as a really good plot for a Netflix show, though.

Reading List 2024.title: Butter
Reading List 2024.author: Asako Yuzuki
Reading List 2024.description: While the plot itself was quite interesting, it was way too long to a point that at some point it was really hard to actually follow and keep on reading. But this could have also been caused by the translation.

Reading List 2024.title: The Templar Legacy (Cotton Malone 1)
Reading List 2024.author: Steve Berry
Reading List 2024.description: A really fast-paced book that was hard to put away. Especially if you are into the topic of templars and conspiracy theories around it.

Reading List 2024.title: Miteinander reden 1
Reading List 2024.author: Friedemann Schulz von Thun
Reading List 2024.description: This book explains some quite theoretical concepts of communications psychology in terms that the regular reader can understand and even recognize in their own everyday life.

Reading List 2024.title: A Clash of Kings: A Song of Ice and Fire
Reading List 2024.author: George R. R. Martin

Reading List 2024.title: Engineering Management for the rest of us
Reading List 2024.author: Sarah Drasner
Reading List 2024.description: Really good introductory book about engineering management. It covers all the main topics and also gives a overview of what to expect when moving into this role from being an IC which was really valuable for myself. Could be a bit more detailed in some parts of the book.

Reading List 2024.title: Feel-Good Productivity: How to Do More of What Matters to You
Reading List 2024.author: Ali Abdaal

Reading List 2024.title: Relentless
Reading List 2024.author: Mike McCrary
Reading List 2024.description: While this book has it's twists and turns, most of the book felt like it was the same theme repeated over and over again without actually making any progress for the main character.
